Time Series List to Data Frame

Source: R/tsl_to_df.R
tsl_to_df.Rd

Time Series List to Data Frame

Usage

tsl_to_df(tsl = NULL)

Arguments

tsl

(required, list) Time series list. Default: NULL

Value

data frame

See also

Other data_processing: tsl_aggregate(), tsl_resample(), tsl_split(), tsl_subset(), tsl_transform(), zoo_aggregate(), zoo_permute(), zoo_resample()

Examples


tsl <- tsl_simulate(
  n = 3,
  rows = 10,
  time_range = c(
    "2010-01-01",
    "2020-01-01"
  )
)

df <- tsl_to_df(
  tsl = tsl
)

names(df)
#> [1] "name" "time" "a"    "b"    "c"    "d"    "e"   
nrow(df)
#> [1] 30
head(df)
#>              name       time          a         b         c         d         e
#> A.2010-07-07    A 2010-07-07 0.08348423 0.1793025 0.4799905 0.3907275 0.1919960
#> A.2011-04-14    A 2011-04-14 0.16771339 0.2415401 0.3555188 0.2429726 0.2116954
#> A.2011-07-16    A 2011-07-16 0.14881885 0.2273700 0.3728658 0.3049885 0.4347005
#> A.2012-04-22    A 2012-04-22 0.34990837 0.3158098 0.3334228 0.2009160 0.3146760
#> A.2013-05-02    A 2013-05-02 0.39211016 0.2815837 0.3209414 0.1858726 0.1659380
#> A.2014-11-15    A 2014-11-15 0.36718074 0.3150592 0.3367337 0.1473642 0.2672202
